fig.label: Figure 1
fig.sd-panel: Scheme representing the workflow of fractionation into soluble and insoluble fractions.
Representative Western blot showing total TDP-43 levels (unfractionated), quantification in C, ratio paired-t-test.
Western blot analysis of soluble and insoluble fractions (Red- and yellow rectangles, highlights CTF-35 and CTF-25 respectively in the insoluble fraction).
Quantification of soluble full-length TDP-43, ratio paired-t-test.
Quantification of insoluble full-length TDP-43, ratio paired-t-test.
Graph contains quantification of insoluble c-terminal fragment of 35kDa (CTF-35), ratio paired-t-test,
Graph indicates quantification of insoluble c-terminal fragment of 25kDa (CTF-25), ratio paired-t-test.

fig.label: Figure 2
fig.sd-panel: Immunofluorescent analysis of TDP-43 in control and mutant TDP-43 iPSC-derived motor neurons. Upper images represent control and lower mutant TDP-43 motor neurons. Presented immunofluorescent images of control (C2) and mutant TDP-43 (P2), Scale bar: 20µm.
Corresponding profile intensity plot of panel A.
Quantification of the nucleo-cytoplasmic ratio (N/C) of TDP-43 fluorescent intensity of pooled control and pooled mutant motor neurons, unpaired Mann-Whitney-test.
Western blot analysis of cytoplasmic fraction with a positive nuclear control (C) confirming the fractionation purity, quantification in E, ratio paired-t-test.
Western blot analysis of nuclear fraction with a positive cytoplasmic control (C) confirming the fractionation purity, quantification in G, ratio paired-t-test.

Immunofluorescent analysis showing fluorescence intensity of phosphorylated TDP-43 (pTDP-43). Scale bar: 20µm. Presented immunofluorescent images of control (C2) and mutant TDP-43 (P2). I represents its corresponding profile intensity plot of the selected (square) region. Scale bar: 10µm, J quantification pooled control (C0=10, C1=10 and C2=10) n=30 and pooled mutant TDP-43 (P1=10, P2=10 and P3=10) n=30 cells from each differentiation. Unpaired Mann-Whitney-test.
Western blot analysis showing pTDP-43, quantification in L, ratio paired-t-test.

fig.label: Figure 3
fig.sd-panel: Scheme representing the two cell lines generated from the mutant TDP-43 iPSCs by either endogenously tagging the WT TDP-43 allele or the mutant TDP-43 allele with mCherry.
Immunofluorescent analysis with in C its corresponding intensity plot showing cytoplasmic mislocalization of the MUT-mCherry TDP-43 in motor neurons, but not in WT-mCherry TDP-43. Scale bar: 20µm.

Quantification of nucleo-cytoplasmic (N/C) intensity ratio based on immunohistochemistry of WT-mCherry (n=45) and MUT-mCherry (n=63) tagged TDP-43. Each dot represents one analysed cell, unpaired Mann-Whitney-test.

Western blots showing nucleo-cytoplasmic fractionation of WT-mCherry and MUT-mCherry iPSC-derived motor neurons with F (left panel) quantification of total mCherry and total untagged TDP-43 on α-tubulin and (right panel) relative cytoplasmic mCherry and untagged TDP-43 on total mCherry and total untagged TDP-43 respectively

quantification of total mCherry and total untagged TDP-43 on α-tubulin and (right panel) relative cytoplasmic mCherry and untagged TDP-43 on total mCherry and total untagged TDP-43 respectively, ratio paired-t-test.

(left panel) quantification of total mCherry and total untagged TDP-43 on Histone H4 and (right panel) relative nuclear mCherry and untagged TDP-43 on total mCherry and total untagged TDP-43 respectively, ratio paired-t-test.

Quantification of nucleo-cytoplasmic (N/C) intensity ratio based on immunohistochemistry of WT-mCherry (n=45) and MUT-mCherry (n=63) tagged TDP-43. Each dot represents one analysed cell, unpaired Mann-Whitney-test. Western blot showing untagged TDP-43 (left panel) and phosphorylation state of the untagged allele (right panel) in WT -and MUT-mCherry motor neurons and in I ratio quantification of normalized pTDP43/normalized TDP-43 (because of almost the same molecular weight two different blots were used), ratio paired-t-test.

fig.label: Figure 4
fig.sd-panel: Representative kymographs from control and mutant TDP-43 iPSC-derived motor neurons. The x-axis represent distance in µm while on the y-axis time in seconds is revealed. Stationary mitochondria are visible as straight vertical lines, while moving mitochondria are depicted as skewed lines. B Quantification of percentage of moving mitochondria.
Quantification of the absolute number of moving mitochondria.
Quantification of stationary mitochondria normalized to neurite length 100µm.

fig.label: Figure 5
fig.sd-panel: Western blot analysis of total fraction of TDP-43 levels in healthy controls (C0, C1 and C2), isogenic P1 (Iso-P1) and mutant P1 (P1) motor neurons.
Quantification of total full-length TDP-43 levels, ratio paired-t-test.
Western blot of soluble fraction
quantification of soluble full-length TDP-43, ratio paired-t-test.
Western blot of insoluble fraction and F quantification of insoluble full-length TDP-43, ratio paired-t-test,
quantification of insoluble CTF-35, ratio paired-t-test and H quantification of insoluble CTF-25, ratio paired-t-test.

fig.label: Figure 6
fig.sd-panel: Western blot analysis of cytoplasmic TDP-43 protein levels in healthy controls (C0, C1 and C2), isogenic P1 (Iso-P1) and mutant P1 (P1) motor neurons.
Quantification of cytoplasmic TDP-43 levels, each dot represents an independent differentiation, ratio paired-t-test.
Western blot analysis of nuclear TDP-43 and D quantification of nuclear TDP-43 levels, each dot represents an independent differentiation, ratio paired-t-test.

Immunofluorescent analysis showing fluorescence intensity of pTDP-43 in motor neurons. Scale bar: 10µm and its perspective intensity plot in F. G Quantification of E, each dot represents one analysed cell, unpaired Mann-Whitney-test.
Western blot analysis showing pTDP-43 levels in healthy controls, Iso-P1 and P1, quantification in I, each dot represents one analysed cell, unpaired Mann-Whitney test.
axonal transport analysis. Quantification of percentage of moving mitochondria (J), number of moving mitochondria (K) and number of stationary mitochondria (L) normalized to neurite length 100µm.

fig.label: Figure 7
fig.sd-panel: Western blot showing total TDP-43 levels, quantification in B, ratio paired-t-test.

Total cell lysates were fractionated into soluble and insoluble fractions and analysed by Western blot, representative Western blots of soluble and insoluble fraction without C and with D HDAC6 inhibitor treatment.
Quantification of soluble full-length TDP-43 levels, ratio paired-t-test and E quantification of insoluble full-length TDP-43 levels, ratio paired-t-test.
Western blots of insoluble fraction with (right) and without (left) HDAC6 inhibitor treatment.
Quantification of insoluble c-terminal fragment of 35kDa (CTF-35; H) and insoluble c-terminal fragment of 25kDa (CTF-25; I), ratio paired-t-test.

fig.label: Figure 8
fig.sd-panel: Immunofluorescent analysis of TDP-43 in control, mutant TDP-43 and mutant TDP-43+HDAC6 inhibitor after 12 h treatment. Presented immunofluorescent images of control (C2) and mutant TDP-43 (P2). Scale bar: 25µm. B Profile intensity plot of control, mutant TDP-43 and mutant TDP-43+HDAC6 inhibitor. C Quantification of nucleo-cytoplasmic ratio (N/C) fluorescent intensity of TDP-43 in motor neurons, each dot represents one analyzed cell, unpaired Mann-Whitney-test.
Western blot analysis of cytosolic fraction, quantification in E, ratio paired-t-test.
Western blot analysis of nuclear fraction, quantification in G, ratio paired-t-test.
Western blot analysis showing pTDP-43 levels and I quantification, ratio paired-t-test.

fig.label: Figure 9
fig.sd-panel: Representative Western blot of total (mCherry and untagged), cytoplasmic TDP-43 and nuclear levels with and without HDAC6 inhibitor.
Quantification of total mCherry and total untagged relative to α-tubulin, ratio paired-t-test.
Quantification of relative cytoplasmic mCherry TDP-43 on total fraction, ratio paired-t-test.
Quantification of total mCherry and total untagged relative to Histone H4, ratio paired-t-test.
Quantification of relative nuclear mCherry TDP-43 on total fraction, ratio paired-t-test.
Western blot showing untagged TDP-43 (left panel) and phosphorylation state of the untagged allele (right panel) in WT -and MUT-mCherry motor neurons
Ratio quantification of normalized pTDP43/normalized TDP-43 (because of almost the same molecular weight two different blots were used), ratio paired-t-test.

fig.label: Figure 10
fig.sd-panel: Quantification of percentage of moving mitochondria,
quantification of the absolute amount of moving mitochondria
quantification of the amount of stationary mitochondria normalized to neurite length 100µm in each quantification.

fig.label: Figure 11
fig.sd-panel: Scheme illustrating set-up of TDP-43 interactome analysis.
Ranked GO enrichment analysis of mutant versus wildtype TDP-43 interactors indicates nuclear depletion of mutant TDP-43.
More detailed GO analysis further highlights nuclear depletion of mutant TDP-43 and potential loss-of-function mechanisms.
Several axonal transport factors differentially interact with mutant versus wildtype TDP-43.
The mutant TDP-43 interactome is depleted for nuclear transport factors and enriched for proteostasis factors, in line with its observed nuclear depletion and cytoplasmic pathological alterations.
Scheme illustrating the effect of HDAC6 inhibition on mutant TDP-43 phenotypes.
Ranked GO enrichment analysis highlights the effect of HDAC6 inhibition on the mutant TDP-43 interactome, in line with its restored nuclear localization.
